Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name SpamSchutz - simple way to protect your mail adresses from naïve spammers
Description This spamschutz (=spam protector in German) can be launched as an applet or a standalone application. It converts all given characters to their ASCII representation, thus making it hard for regular expressions to find mail adresses.
Homepage https://github.com/ottlinger/spamschutz/

Project Organization

Field Value
Name Aiki IT
URL http://www.aiki-it.de
